vinNumHint: look to image to can understand  what is Vin Number
vinInstructionOne: It is a unique number specific to your vehicle. It can be used to provide you with parts that fit your vehicle more accurately. It consists of 17 numbers and English letters and is located on the vehicle registration in the chassis number field.
vinInstructionTwo: It is also located on a metal plate that appears on the edge of the driver's door after it is opened.

whatIsPricing: What is the spare parts pricing process in Atlobha?
addNameNum: Add the name or number of the spare parts for your car, and attach an image if available.
searchForItems: Our team will search for the parts from trusted dealerships and price them at the best available market rates.
informYouWhenDone: You will be notified when the pricing process is complete. Confirm your request to proceed with the order.
ConfirmThePricing: Upon confirmation, payment and delivery details will be finalized, and the parts will be sent to your provided address.
needMoreInfo: I want more information about it.
howPricingMade: How does the pricing process work?
discoverPricingMade: Discover how the pricing process works at Atlobha to assist you in the best way.
determinePaymentMethod: Payment method will be determined later after pricing the parts.
partsAreOriginal: All parts are original and guaranteed by Atlobha’s partners.
confirmMessage: You will receive a confirmation email once you use it. If you have an account, the order will appear there once you receive the email.
dateLater: The delivery date will be determined later after the order is confirmed.
enterPhoneToCall: Add your phone number to your profile so we can contact you.
logWithPhone: You can also log in using the same phone number
numberEnteredBefore: The number you entered is already registered with Atlobha
mergeTwoAccounts: The accounts will now be merged. Are you sure?
enterOtpSendto: Enter the confirmation code that was sent to you.
returnReplace: Spare Parts Replacement and Return Policy
sevenDaysReplace: Spare parts can be replaced within 7 days from the date of receiving the item, provided that:
cleanPart: The parts are clean, unused, and in their original packaging at the time of purchase.
replacePart: Specially ordered parts for the customer are nonreturnable, non-refundable, and non-exchangeable, as they cannot be sold to another customer.
shippingCost: Shipping Costs for Spare Parts Replacement:
atlobhaAfford: Atlobha covers shipping costs in the following cases:
differenceInpart: If there is a mistake or discrepancy between the part ordered and the part received
correctPartShipped: The correct part will be shipped and replaced for the customer.
clientAfford: The customer bears shipping costs in the following cases:
errorFromCustomer: If the error is from the customer in ordering the part.
noChaseNum: If the chassis number was not provided at the time of the order.
noLongerNeed: If the customer no longer needs the part after it has been shipped.
collectThisData: We collect the following information during your use of the app:
dataLikeThis: Personal Information: Name, phone number, and location.
deviceType: Automatic Information: IP address, device type, and user activity
withSP: Information may be shared with service providers and partners when necessary to deliver services.
willNotshared: Your information will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
weUseCookies: We use cookies to improve user experience. You may disable them through your browser settings.
storeForLaw: We retain information only for as long as needed to provide services or as required by law
rightToReview: You have the right to review, update, or delete your data. Contact us at info@atlobha.co for assistance.
changeAndUpdate: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy as needed. Users will be notified of significant change
rulesApplied: These terms and conditions apply to your use of the “Atlobha” website and application.
readCarefully: Please read the terms carefully before using our services.
youAccept: By using the “Atlobha” app and placing orders, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the app.
hasEligibility: Users must have full legal capacity to enter into contracts .
confirmEligibility: By using the app, you confirm that you meet these eligibility criteria .
atlobhaDesccribe: Atlobha” is an e-commerce platform operated by Al-Falak Al-Abyad“ :for E-Commerce Co. Ltd., which provides
sellSpareParts: The sale of spare parts sourced from agencies and shops.
maintenanceService: Maintenance services through approved service centers.
deliveryService: ًUpcoming services include mobile maintenance and roadside assistance.
deliverySpareParts: Delivery of spare parts: Available across Saudi Arabia .
maintenaceService: Maintenance services: Currently limited to Riyadh.
workingHrs: Operating hours: Saturday to Thursday, 8:30 AM to 7:00
makeRequest: Customers place orders via the app .
pricedImmedialty: Pricing is completed within 45 minutes (or depending on the availability of parts).
invoiceDetails: Customers receive a detailed invoice including the part price,tax, and delivery fees.
installBank: Monthly installment plans via select banks, subject to additional terms.
exceptionsParts: Exclusions: Consumable parts and unauthorized maintenance are not covered.
timeToReturn: Refunds are processed within 7 to 21 business days from the date of receiving the returned item.
propertyForAtlobha: All intellectual property rights for the app and its content are owned by “Atlobha.” No copying, sharing, or reproduction of content is allowed except for personal use.
pageUnderDevelop: This page is under development and will be launched soon to provide you with the best experience. In the meantime, you can use the Atlobha mobile app to enjoy all our services seamlessly.
ifHaveAnyQuestions: If you have any questions or need to make changes to your order, don't hesitate To contact us
pleaseUseEnglishNum: Please use English when writing numbers
OtpHourlyExceed: You have used your number of attempts, please try again in an hour
notFoundInBasket: unavailable, it will be removed from the cart.
minForDelivery: Get free delivery by adding more products
partAvailableInfo: We strive to provide you with the best shopping experience. Item availability and prices may vary. We make sure to update the site periodically to ensure the accuracy of the information.
availablePurchase: Use the available purchase vouchers, whether from Alalaab or from partners, to add Request the balance in your wallet
justUseVoucher: Just use the voucher below and the balance will be added directly to your account
otherInstallment: and ther rest in 4 installments without interest or hidden fees.
colorError: It must be a valid hexadecimal (Hex) color
carNotSupported: Your car is currently not supported in the Spare Parts section.
supportedInOthers: However, it is fully supported in the Services, Oil, and Accessories sections.
dontShowAgain: Do not show this message again
